CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 12,1946, pg. 1, reads: "His First Case - Three youths charged with disorderly conduct face Magistrate Robert E. (Pappy) Williams and Magistrate Frank T. Holleran in new magistrate's first case on the Centre Avenue Police Station's docket. Hearings are being held in Central Police Station, Short and Water Streets, until Centre Avenue station is renovated. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Six men facing Magistrates Robert E. "Pappy" Williams and Frank B. Holleran, in Central Police Station with large bouquets of flowers
